CourseOfrgRubricCriterion.name: CourseOfrgRubricCriterion
CourseOfrgRubricCriterion.description: Represents an activity rubric criterion for a course offering.

ActivityType.description: Specifies the type of activity, such as assignment or quiz.

CountedInstances.description: The number of instances of the activity represented by the record that are counted toward the final grade.

CourseOfferingId.description: The course offering associated with the course offering rubric criterion.

Description.description: A description of the course offering rubric criterion.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, the user might have only accessed this record or list view (LastReferencedDate) but not viewed it.

MaximumInstances.description: The maximum number of times the activity represented by the record can occur within a term.

Name.description: The name of the course offering rubric criterion.

OwnerId.description: The user who owns this record.

Weight.description: The weight of the course offering rubric criterion.
